channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Guide to Why You Should Buy Bonds (And Why You Shouldn't)
item.description: Bonds have regained the haven property that made them desirable for 60/40 portfolios. But that may not matter as much as usually believed.

item.title: ‘I have zero regrets’: I’m 84 and estranged from my two adult sons. My 48-year-old wife will get my seven-figure estate. Is that selfish?
item.description: “My will and trust will exclude everyone that carries my family name.”

item.title: September Is Once Again a Tough Month for Stocks
item.description: The S&P 500 fell 4.2% last week on concerns about the health of the U.S. economy. Going back to 1928, September has been stocks’ weakest month of the ...

item.title: I’m buying my husband out of our house in New Jersey. What’s the best way to access equity in my home?
item.description: “I won’t have a problem getting a mortgage or being able to refinance.”

item.title: Crypto Plan Creates Potential Conflicts for Trump
item.description: The former president’s digital-currency efforts bring his campaign closer to an industry that is spending to limit regulations.

item.title: ‘I’m trapped between warring siblings’: My late father left a ledger with $80,000 in unpaid bills from my brothers. Can the executor force them to pay?
item.description: “His will states that his estate is to be divided equally among his five children.”

item.title: Why Am I Overspending? Blame It on Politics
item.description: Election fatigue has me and my friends so anxious that we find solace in buying more stuff than we should.

item.title: Two retail analysts travelled to China and came back with three downgrades
item.description: Barclays analysts downgraded Adidas, Burberry and Gucci owner Kering following a two-and-half week trip to China in which they grew more cautious on t...

item.title: Look Before Leaping Into the World's Hottest Stock Market
item.description: Indian stocks are on fire. Investors who want to partake will need to keep a cool head as a trading frenzy and rising valuations have the potential to...

item.title: Europe’s heading for a recession as the U.S. consumer buckles, strategist warns
item.description: Europe is heading into a recession as the U.S. consumer buckles, a strategist warned, advising investors to shift into defensive stocks.
